mergeResults.content: Identity: Adult Companion mare, brilliant white coat, silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane; unpartnered for three years before this. Arc: Drew toward devastation by the Call; found Rance collapsed in crater surrounded by wild magic residue; recognized Gift-shock and uncontrolled awakening; Chose him despite his age, bitterness, and catastrophic first manifestation—'There is only the right Chosen for each Companion.' Relationship with Rance: Chose him after he examined evidence; bond formed when eyes locked—her mindvoice 'clear as crystal bells, warm as summer sunshine'; poured unconditional love into him, stabilized his fracturing mind with mental bridges across burned channels; revealed he caused the destruction himself; frustrated by his stubbornness (insulted when he called her 'horse,' irritated when he insisted on examining bodies, nipped his shoulder to get attention); accepts his determination but insists on Waystation stop for herbs/rest; their bond already stabilizing his wild Gift; shares his purpose to warn Haven. Abilities: Mind-speech with Chosen; can travel three times distance of ordinary horses; heightened magical senses.

Adult Companion mare, brilliant white coat, silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane; unpartnered for three years before Choosing. Drew toward devastation by the Call; found Rance collapsed in crater surrounded by wild magic residue; recognized Gift-shock and uncontrolled awakening. Chose him despite his age, bitterness, and catastrophic first manifestation—'There is only the right Chosen for each Companion.' Bond formed when eyes locked—mindvoice 'clear as crystal bells, warm as summer sunshine'; poured unconditional love into him, stabilized his fracturing mind with mental bridges across burned channels; revealed he caused the destruction himself. Reciprocal affection now established. Suspects Rance's Gift is rarer/more dangerous than Firestarting; unprecedented in five centuries with no one capable of training it. Promised to incapacitate him if he loses control. STANCE-Rance: Protective, devoted, occasionally frustrated by stubbornness (nipped shoulder for attention, insulted when called 'horse'); accepts his determination; shares his purpose to warn Haven. Confirms Karsite blood magic historically real, officially banned for decades—revival concerning. Rode relentlessly four days/nights without true rest to reach Haven. Met Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) upon arrival; refused to leave Rance's side despite exhaustion. Abilities: Mind-speech with Chosen; can travel three times distance of ordinary horses; heightened magical senses.

Adult Companion mare, brilliant white coat (currently dulled with road dust from days of hard travel), silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane; unpartnered for three years before Choosing. Drew toward devastation by the Call; found Rance collapsed in crater surrounded by wild magic residue; recognized Gift-shock and uncontrolled awakening. Chose him despite his age, bitterness, and catastrophic first manifestation—'There is only the right Chosen for each Companion.' Bond formed when eyes locked—mindvoice 'clear as crystal bells, warm as summer sunshine'; poured unconditional love into him, stabilized his fracturing mind with mental bridges across burned channels. Reciprocal affection now established. Identified his Gift as Mage-Gift—raw, wild type not seen since Vanyel; unprecedented in five centuries with no one capable of training it. Increasingly awed by scope of his abilities while concerned about political/magical ramifications. Contingency confirmed: will incapacitate him if he loses control. STANCE-Rance: Protective, devoted, occasionally frustrated by stubbornness (nipped shoulder for attention, insulted when called 'horse'); accepts his determination; shares his purpose to warn Haven; stood guard during unprecedented full mind-merge memory recovery. Confirms Karsite blood magic historically real, officially banned for decades—revival concerning. Exhausted from riding relentlessly four days/nights carrying unconscious Rance across Valdemar without true rest to reach Haven. Met Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) upon arrival; refused to leave Rance's side despite exhaustion. Abilities: Mind-speech with Chosen; can travel three times distance of ordinary horses; heightened magical senses.
